column1: Balfor is a Dwarves created for The Hobbit (2003 video game). He is voiced by Wally Wingert.http://www.wallyontheweb.com/home_new.html Wallyontheweb.com
Balfor was a Dwarf of the Iron Hills
column2: captured by Goblins. He was set to work on the Dwarf-built contraptions in Goblin-town. Ugslap was his guard.

column1: Bilbo Baggins met him when he was lost in the Misty Mountains. After a deal with Ugslap to free Balfor went sour
column2: Balfor was taken back to another cell. Bilbo dodged the guards and opened the cell
column3: after which Balfor slew every goblin in the room. He then showed Bilbo a way out of Goblin-town. Bilbo
column5: wound up in Gollums cave.The Hobbit (2003 video game)
